__e: For a man like MacLeod, time has little meaning.
Mr. MacLeod, what you know about our company?
When MacLeod left you, he killed one of our men.
From today onward, he shall be known as our brother Colin MacLeod of Clan MacLeod.
The great Duncan MacLeod of the clan MacLeod is not allowed to change his mind.
I'm Duncan Macleod of the Clan Macleod, and I thing your fight's with me.
